title: Beautiful Mermaid
source:
stateDiagram-v2
    direction LR
    [*] --> Input
    Input --> Parse: DSL
    Parse --> Layout: AST
    Layout --> SVG: Vector
    Layout --> ASCII: Text
    SVG --> Theme
    ASCII --> Theme
    Theme --> Output
    Output --> [*]

title: Simple Flow
source:
graph TD
  A[Start] --> B[Process] --> C[End]

title: Original Node Shapes
source:
graph LR
  A[Rectangle] --> B(Rounded)
  B --> C{Diamond}
  C --> D([Stadium])
  D --> E((Circle))

title: Batch 1 Shapes
Batch 2 Shapes
source:
graph LR
  A[(Database)] --> B>Flag Shape]
  B --> C[/Wider Bottom\]
  C --> D[\Wider Top/]

title: All 12 Flowchart Shapes
source:
graph LR
  A[Rectangle] --> B(Rounded)
  B --> C{Diamond}
  C --> D([Stadium])
  D --> E((Circle))
  E --> F[[Subroutine]]
  F --> G(((Double Circle)))
  G --> H{{Hexagon}}
  H --> I[(Database)]
  I --> J>Flag]
  J --> K[/Trapezoid\]
  K --> L[\Inverse Trap/]

title: All Edge Styles
source:
graph TD
  A[Source] -->|solid| B[Target 1]
  A -.->|dotted| C[Target 2]
  A ==>|thick| D[Target 3]

title: No-Arrow Edges
source:
graph TD
  A[Node 1] ---|related| B[Node 2]
  B -.- C[Node 3]
  C === D[Node 4]

title: Bidirectional Arrows
source:
graph LR
  A[Client] <-->|sync| B[Server]
  B <-.->|heartbeat| C[Monitor]
  C <==>|data| D[Storage]

title: Parallel Links (&)
source:
graph TD
  A[Input] & B[Config] --> C[Processor]
  C --> D[Output] & E[Log]

title: Chained Edges
source:
graph LR
  A[Step 1] --> B[Step 2] --> C[Step 3] --> D[Step 4] --> E[Step 5]

title: Direction: Left-Right (LR)
source:
graph LR
  A[Input] --> B[Transform] --> C[Output]

title: Direction: Bottom-Top (BT)
source:
graph BT
  A[Foundation] --> B[Layer 2] --> C[Top]

title: Subgraphs
source:
graph TD
  subgraph Frontend
    A[React App] --> B[State Manager]
  end
  subgraph Backend
    C[API Server] --> D[Database]
  end
  B --> C

title: Nested Subgraphs
source:
graph TD
  subgraph Cloud
    subgraph us-east [US East Region]
      A[Web Server] --> B[App Server]
    end
    subgraph us-west [US West Region]
      C[Web Server] --> D[App Server]
    end
  end
  E[Load Balancer] --> A
  E --> C

title: Subgraph Direction Override
source:
graph TD
  subgraph pipeline [Processing Pipeline]
    direction LR
    A[Input] --> B[Parse] --> C[Transform] --> D[Output]
  end
  E[Source] --> A
  D --> F[Sink]

title: ::: Class Shorthand
source:
graph TD
  A[Normal]:::default --> B[Highlighted]:::highlight --> C[Error]:::error
  classDef default fill:#f4f4f5,stroke:#a1a1aa
  classDef highlight fill:#fbbf24,stroke:#d97706
  classDef error fill:#ef4444,stroke:#dc2626

title: Inline Style Overrides
source:
graph TD
  A[Default] --> B[Custom Colors] --> C[Another Custom]
  style B fill:#3b82f6,stroke:#1d4ed8,color:#ffffff
  style C fill:#10b981,stroke:#059669

title: CI/CD Pipeline
source:
graph TD
  subgraph ci [CI Pipeline]
    A[Push Code] --> B{Tests Pass?}
    B -->|Yes| C[Build Image]
    B -->|No| D[Fix & Retry]
    D -.-> A
  end
  C --> E([Deploy Staging])
  E --> F{QA Approved?}
  F -->|Yes| G((Production))
  F -->|No| D

title: System Architecture
source:
graph LR
  subgraph clients [Client Layer]
    A([Web App]) --> B[API Gateway]
    C([Mobile App]) --> B
  end
  subgraph services [Service Layer]
    B --> D[Auth Service]
    B --> E[User Service]
    B --> F[Order Service]
  end
  subgraph data [Data Layer]
    D --> G[(Auth DB)]
    E --> H[(User DB)]
    F --> I[(Order DB)]
    F --> J([Message Queue])
  end

title: Decision Tree
source:
graph TD
  A{Is it raining?} -->|Yes| B{Have umbrella?}
  A -->|No| C([Go outside])
  B -->|Yes| D([Go with umbrella])
  B -->|No| E{Is it heavy?}
  E -->|Yes| F([Stay inside])
  E -->|No| G([Run for it])

title: Git Branching Workflow
source:
graph LR
  A[main] --> B[develop]
  B --> C[feature/auth]
  B --> D[feature/ui]
  C --> E{PR Review}
  D --> E
  E -->|approved| B
  B --> F[release/1.0]
  F --> G{Tests?}
  G -->|pass| A
  G -->|fail| F

title: Basic State Diagram
source:
stateDiagram-v2
  [*] --> Idle
  Idle --> Active : start
  Active --> Idle : cancel
  Active --> Done : complete
  Done --> [*]

title: State: Composite States
source:
stateDiagram-v2
  [*] --> Idle
  Idle --> Processing : submit
  state Processing {
    parse --> validate
    validate --> execute
  }
  Processing --> Complete : done
  Processing --> Error : fail
  Error --> Idle : retry
  Complete --> [*]

title: State: Connection Lifecycle
source:
stateDiagram-v2
  [*] --> Closed
  Closed --> Connecting : connect
  Connecting --> Connected : success
  Connecting --> Closed : timeout
  Connected --> Disconnecting : close
  Connected --> Reconnecting : error
  Reconnecting --> Connected : success
  Reconnecting --> Closed : max_retries
  Disconnecting --> Closed : done
  Closed --> [*]
